original_text: For he built again the high places which Hezekiah his father had broken down, and he reared up altars for Baalim, and made groves, and worshipped all the host of heaven, and served them.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 히스기야가 헐어 버린 산당을 다시 세우며 바알들을 위하여 제단을 쌓으며 아세라 목상을 만들며 하늘의 모든 일월성신을 경배하여 섬기며

sentences.original_text: For he built again the high places
which Hezekiah his father had broken down,
and he reared up altars for Baalim,
and worshipped all the host of heaven,
